CustomField.formula:
If(ISNULL(Graduated_Date__c),
(today() - datevalue(Benefits_Imported_Date__c) - 2*( floor((today() - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(Benefits_Imported_Date__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))),
(datevalue(Graduated_Date__c) - datevalue(Benefits_Imported_Date__c) - 2*( floor((datevalue(Graduated_Date__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7) - floor((datevalue(Benefits_Imported_Date__c) - DATE(1985, 6, 24))/7))))
CustomField.label: #Days Graduated
